kv9.6:1.5_0: Hañci atītārammaṇaṁ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv9.6:1.8_0: Hañci vā pana anārammaṇaṁ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv9.6:2.3_0: Nanu atītaṁ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv9.6:2.5_0: Hañci atītaṁ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv9.6:3.5_0: Hañci anāgatārammaṇaṁ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv9.6:3.8_0: Hañci vā pana anārammaṇaṁ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv9.6:4.3_0: Nanu anāgataṁ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv9.6:4.5_0: Hañci anāgataṁ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv9.6:5.1_0: Paccuppannaṁ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, paccuppannārammaṇaṁ cittaṁ sārammaṇanti?
kv9.6:5.3_0: Atītaṁ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, atītārammaṇaṁ cittaṁ sārammaṇanti?
kv9.6:5.5_0: paccuppannaṁ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, paccuppannārammaṇaṁ cittaṁ sārammaṇanti?
kv9.6:5.7_0: Anāgataṁ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, anāgatārammaṇaṁ cittaṁ sārammaṇanti?
kv9.6:6.1_0: Atītaṁ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, atītārammaṇaṁ cittaṁ anārammaṇanti?
kv9.6:6.3_0: Paccuppannaṁ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, paccuppannārammaṇaṁ cittaṁ anārammaṇanti?
kv9.6:7.1_0: Anāgataṁ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, anāgatārammaṇaṁ cittaṁ anārammaṇanti?
kv9.6:7.3_0: Paccuppannaṁ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, paccuppannārammaṇaṁ cittaṁ anārammaṇanti?
kv9.6:8.6_0: Hañci atītānāgataṁ natthi, tena vata re vattabbe—
